documents.title: ta-ra
text: robertson that 's all for today .
it 's been wild .
lanre bakare and gwilym mumford will be here tomorrow with lots of this :

documents.title: utopia style tips
text: not only is utopia the best thing on british television right now ( â© everyone ) but it has seriously upped the visual stakes , from its launch episode when it made everything look like the instagram filter that everyone avoids because it brings out your eyebags even more , to the pervasive presence of the colour yellow .
in short : it 's great , and we wish that we had an inch of its toxic style .
here 's how to pull off that distinct the-world-is-going-to-sht utopia look .
go chartreuse or lose mcnamara good on you if you 're someone who can pull off a chartreuse suit , surely a harder feat than this year 's tricky culottes trend .
if you are not stiff of quiff or a cockney gangster , though , daub the colour on your walls , door , floor or face .
dulux will be stocking utopia yellow soon , mark our words .
if at all possible , dress in the dark jessica hyde has perfected the art of stealing a teenage delinquent 's bag and putting on whatever 's in it .
we 're calling this haphazard effect klepto-grunge .
the mussy , post-ombre crop gives an extra edge to her turquoise babydoll dress/knife combo .
just add heels and go .

imagine yourself as a rude boy pirate kramer from seinfeld and big ed 's wife from twin peaks may have been the first tv style leaders on this one but utopia 's wilson wilson manages to make the eye patch look extra-suave .
could it be the carefully stitched , spoon-proof leather ?
perhaps it 's the rest of his cosmic rudeboy getup .
or maybe it 's just the knowledge that it shields a gruesome socket wound .
wear neon pink for extra shock factor .
do n't leave the house without arby 's bag the ultimate must-have accessory for all your serial killer gear , a cross between a bottomless ikea bag and a bike pannier .
( but seriously , what the hell is arby keeping in it ?
our money 's on a lifetime 's supply of quinoa . )
get an angular fringe at all costs utopia series 2 .
and finally , if you ca n't perfect becky 's incredible welsh lilt ( altogether now : eeey-yunn ) , get a blunt fringe cut instead .

it says quirky ' but hidden depths ' ; stylish ' but not intimidating ' ; totally going to dick you over in the quest to uncover the secrets of utopia ' but will distract you by eating your food ' .
the fringe also comes in handy when trying to hide a nasty case of deels .
got more utopia style tips ?
tweet us @ twitterid .

documents.title: make your own expendables
text: the expendables 3 and half of bruce willis .
bored at work ?
got some time on your hands ?
it was the expendables 3 premiere in london last night so , er , why not photoshop your ideal expendable lineups and we 'll put the best ones ( or whoever sends us one tbh ) on the blog .
need some inspiration ?
the guide 's luke holland has excelled himself with this fantasy lineup .
â© luke holland .

documents.title: get a load of twigs
text: toffee apple twigs .
what 's that breathless moaning seeping out of your colleague 's headphones this afternoon ?
it 's probably rising singer fka twigs 's audio turn-on of a debut album , now streaming on itunes .
listen to her minimal electronic gasps and pants here .

documents.title: chris pratt 's secretly amazing rap skills
text: got your sandwich ?
filled up your water bottle ?
good .
now watch the video doing the rounds of guardians of the galaxy and parks and recreation star chris pratt 's incredible rendition of eminem 's forgot about dre .
it 's just like he was always one of us , practising this for hours on end in a backwards cap in front of a mirror , ignoring mum 's shouts for dinnertime .
he 's not the first actor to break the internet with his fast flow .
who could forgot idris king driis ' elba and his patois rhymes ?
or mr t 's guttural , monotone family values rap ?
and , of course , a young mark wahlberg wanting to see sweat comin ' out yo ' pawwws in marky mark and the funky bunch .
ok , that 's all we got .
tweet us with your favourite actor-rappers or something .

documents.title: and the true detective rumour mill keeps on rolling
text: choux detective .
sayles/ap first up , vince vaughn has reportedly been in talks to star in true detective 2 , which is great because it would mean less of this : the internship .
and more of this : swingers .
except that he 's actually rumoured to play a thug turned businessmen character more along the lines of this : be cool .
also poking around is mad men 's elisabeth moss for the female lead and colin farrell and taylor kitsch for two of the three detectives .
more stirring the rumour pot next week ( probably tomorrow ) , folks !
in the meantime , for every casting rumour to date , go here .

documents.title: lorde it up till the cows come home
text: here 's something you never would have guessed in a mil years : cows love lorde , specifically her track royals , which is probably the best alternative cattle call known to animal .
here 's farmer derek klingenberg covering it on trombone as , movingly , the cows come over the hill .

documents.title: it 's not even midday yet but here 's jon hamm in a pool
text: british gq ( @ britishgq ) get an exclusive preview of jon hamm 's gq cover interview here : you 'll be pleased to know that his disembodied voice is just as sexy .
you can hear it in ari folman 's new live action/animation film the congress , in which he plays an animated animator doomed to look like dave navarro 4lyf .
it 's out in uk cinemas next friday ( 15 aug ) and , let me tell you , is totally batshit .

documents.title: meanwhile , back in blighty
text: peebles/bbc here 's another reason to go on ignoring the script

documents.title: while you were sleeping¦
text: america was having all the fun !
here are the top pop culture stories from across the pond .
big clam theory .
.cbs/everett/rex 1// the big bang theory cast is richer than you 'll ever be .
2// back off woman , i 'm a scientist !
ghostbusters 3 could well end up being a female-fronted version , directed by paul feig .
3// the american pop culture blogs are really into charli xcx 's cover of i want candy .
i would like her to get famous already .
4// hip-hop heavyweight vanilla ice is peeved at the rapping in the new teenage mutant ninja turtle film .
pretty sure he 's regretting getting that donatello tattoo¦ 5// and finally , kanye west brough his daughter north into the studio with him .
whatever counts as news these days , guys .

documents.title: ahoy , sniff a bit of this !
text: morning , morning .
k-hutch on the guide daily blog today .
i 've got some absolute bangers coming up for you later today but first , i 've got my nostrils in a twist over the trailer for e4 's new ya crime drama , glue .
it features some of britain 's best young acting talent callum turner , yasmin paige and jessica cave , among them some horses , a freaky looking spine , and lots of lovely english countryside .
oh , and jordan from rizzle kicks , but i 'm willing to be won over .
it 's written by jack thorne , who did the first ( good ) two series of skins and this is england , too , so , you know , big tings .
